introduction.html:div: Babel is a set of tools to make the job of globalizing Eclipse projects easier. We also want to provide ways for people world wide, who are interested, to contribute translations in their language of choice.

ul.li: Source code tagged with "R1_0" in CVS repository
Babel Runtime available as downloadable zip and at Babel Runtime Update Site
Babel Language Pack Update Site for Ganymede
Babel Language Pack Update Site for Europa

preamble.html:div: Release milestones will be aligned with the Galileo Simultaneous Release train.

target_environments.html:div: Babel translations is platform independent. Babel Runtime will be tested on the following platforms:

ul.li: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 5.0, x86-32, GTK

internationalization.html:div: Babel Runtime is available for translation in the languages supported by Babel. However, participation may vary.
